title: Covid-19 Pandemic: Live Updates and News for June 6, 2021
content:
1. Covid-19 Pandemic: Live Updates and News for June 6, 2021  Bloomberg
  2. COVID-19: Indian variant 'around 40% more transmissible' than Kent strain, Matt Hancock says  Sky News
  3. Covid-19: Government 'open' to delaying 21 June England lockdown end date  BBC News
  4. Matt Hancock urges adults to get Covid vaccine as under-30s to be offered jab in days  Guardian News
  5. British health minister says too early to decide on lifting lockdown  South China Morning Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
